      • isComplete

        public boolean isComplete()
        Checks if this arena is complete. An arena is considered complete if it has :
        • A pool
        • A start region
        • A diving

      • getPool

        public Pool getPool()

      • safeGetPool

        public Pool safeGetPool(DAC dac)
        Returns the pool if defined or throws an exception if not.
        Parameters:
        dac - the main DAC instance.
        Returns:
        the pool
        Throws:
        ArenaComponentUndefined

      • getSurroundingRegion

        public SurroundingRegion getSurroundingRegion()

      • safeGetSurroundingRegion

        public SurroundingRegion safeGetSurroundingRegion(DAC dac)
        Returns the surrounding region if defined or throws an exception if not. The surrounding region doesn't need to be manually defined. It is also considered defined if the pool and the diving are.
        Parameters:
        dac - the main DAC instance.
        Returns:
        the surrounding region
        Throws:
        ArenaComponentUndefined

      • setSurroundingRegion

        public void setSurroundingRegion(SurroundingRegion surrounding)
        Sets the surrrounding region. This will override the region wich is automatically defined using the pool and the diving.
        Parameters:
        surrounding - the new manually defined surrounding region.
